sentences.english: Electrodeposited diamond bits on thin-wall steel body are new drilling tools for construction.

sentences.english: Removing Duette blinds is very simple and only requires a drill with a Phillips drill bit.

sentences.english: Gravity acts on the large mass of the collars to provide the downward force needed for the bits to efficiently break rock.

sentences.english: Secondly, the different model bits affect the rule of the vibration sources, which is studied.

sentences.english: Requirement on bit steerability is satisfied with the bit's short gage and active gage protection design.

sentences.english: For measurements-while-drilling, the reference is the bit (the driller's depth).
sentences.chinese: 對於隨鑽測量，參考點是鑽頭的深度。

sentences.english: Already the Snowblast's huge auger blades were engorging snow.

sentences.english: As the diamond tip of the drill revolves, it is lubricated by mud.
